event_name: Our statement on the tragic accident that occurred at our Sense Colour factory in Louisville, Kentucky

event_name: Our statement on the tragic, fatal incident at our Sense Colour Factory in Louisville, USA

data.file_name: Our statement on the tragic, fatal incident at our Sense Colour Factory in Louisville, USA

additional_text: We are profoundly saddened to confirm that two of our team members lost their lives in a tragic accident at our Sense Colour factory in Louisville, Kentucky, USA, on Tuesday.

event_name: Givaudan celebrates 30 years of translating science into emotions with Sense It®

data.file_name: Givaudan celebrates 30 years of translating science into emotions with Sense It®

additional_text: Sense It®, a proprietary taste language created by Givaudan, is celebrating its 30th anniversary. First developed in 1993, it has become a universal and standardised language used around the world for food experience characterisation, differentiation, and product innovation.

event_name: Givaudan rated A for Supplier Engagement by CDP securing a place once again on its Supplier Engagement Rating Leaderboard

event_name: Givaudan unveils RetiLife™, a pioneering 100% natural-origin retinol crafted through biotech

data.file_name: Givaudan unveils RetiLife™, a pioneering 100% natural-origin retinol crafted through biotech

additional_text: Givaudan introduces RetiLife™, a molecule for anti-ageing and a breakthrough evolution for the cosmetic industry. This new active ingredient is the first 100% naturally sourced retinol, and as such a sustainable solution to chemically synthesised retinol.

event_name: Givaudan unveils its first integrated fragrance encapsulation centre in Singapore

data.file_name: Givaudan unveils its first integrated fragrance encapsulation centre in Singapore

additional_text: The integrated centre completes a five-year investment programme of CHF 30 million and will further support the development of encapsulation delivery technology, to meet consumers’ demand for long-lasting fragrance experiences, across a variety of product categories.

event_name: Givaudan enters a new era of fragrance and oral care flavour design with MoodScentz™+

data.file_name: Givaudan enters a new era of fragrance and oral care flavour design with MoodScentz™+

additional_text: Givaudan launched the newly upgraded MoodScentz™+ which redefines our understanding of emotional experience while introducing a new neurobiology measurement capability and extensive data mining.

event_name: Givaudan Active Beauty boosts well-ageing with launch of Siliphos®

data.file_name: Givaudan Active Beauty boosts well-ageing with launch of Siliphos®

additional_text: The new active ingredient Siliphos® outperforms the plant-based retinol alternative bakuchiol while offering benefits that challenge retinoid efficacy by reducing wrinkles without side effects.

event_name: Givaudan grows its sustainable palette of fragrance precursors with the launch of Scentaurus™ Melrose

data.file_name: Givaudan grows its sustainable palette of fragrance precursors with the launch of Scentaurus™ Melrose

additional_text: Scentaurus™ Melrose is a biodegradable molecule that delivers a long-lasting floral green effect with honey and linden blossom facets, and high-performance floral fresh rosy signals with powdery anisic undertones.

event_name: ‘Creatogether’: Givaudan collaborates with TMIC to launch fragrance industry’s first AI-powered fragrance co-creation service in China

data.file_name: ‘Creatogether’: Givaudan collaborates with TMIC to launch fragrance industry’s first AI-powered fragrance co-creation service in China

additional_text: Givaudan has launched its unique human-machine co-creation service powered by artificial intelligence (AI) in collaboration with the Tmall Innovation Centre (TMIC), enabling customers to realise their olfactory vision with unsurpassed sampling speed in China’s unique e-commerce market.

event_name: 2022 Nine month results

data.file_name: 2022 Nine month results

additional_text: Ad hoc announcement pursuant to art. 53 LR | In the first nine months of 2022 Givaudan recorded sales of CHF 5,458 million, an increase of 6.1% on a like-for-like basis and 7.7% in Swiss francs.

event_name: Givaudan and Berkeley publish new research providing view of future technologies for alternative proteins

data.file_name: Givaudan and Berkeley publish new research providing view of future technologies for alternative proteins

additional_text: Givaudan's white paper provides cutting-edge information on current, emerging and future technologies for manufacturers producing meat and fish alternatives.

event_name: Silver Radiance™ programme – Supporting seniors’ wellbeing through fragrance

data.file_name: Silver Radiance™ programme – Supporting seniors’ wellbeing through fragrance

additional_text: By combining research expertise and consumer understanding, Givaudan aims to expand its ability to serve the silver generation’s growing demand for wellbeing solutions.

event_name: Givaudan and the Givaudan Foundation achieve sustainable jasmine training programme in Egypt

data.file_name: Givaudan and the Givaudan Foundation achieve sustainable jasmine training programme in Egypt

additional_text: Givaudan is thrilled to share the very positive results of its responsible sourcing initiative in Egypt. The project involves training local jasmine farmers in safer and more environmentally sustainable agricultural practices.

event_name: Givaudan and LanzaTech announce their collaboration on developing sustainable fragrance ingredients from renewable carbon

data.file_name: Givaudan and LanzaTech announce their collaboration on developing sustainable fragrance ingredients from renewable carbon

additional_text: Givaudan and LanzaTech NZ, Inc. (“LanzaTech”), an innovative Carbon Capture and Transformation (“CCT”) company have announced a collaboration for the development of sustainable fragrance ingredients from renewable carbon.

event_name: Givaudan Active Beauty launches New Purple 2364, a vibrant and sustainable vegan pigment for make-up

data.file_name: Givaudan Active Beauty launches New Purple 2364, a vibrant and sustainable vegan pigment for make-up

additional_text: Givaudan Active Beauty unveils the power and performance of New Purple 23641, a vegan pigment for use in make-up formulations.

event_name: Asia Pacific Scale It Up! Innovation Challenge gives plant-based food start-ups the opportunity to bring their projects to market faster

data.file_name: Asia Pacific Scale It Up! Innovation Challenge gives plant-based food start-ups the opportunity to bring their projects to market faster

additional_text: Bühler, Cargill and Givaudan have joined forces to help accelerate start-ups who are innovating in plant-based protein, to address the needs of a growing global population.

event_name: 2022 Half year results

data.file_name: 2022 Half year results

additional_text: Ad hoc announcement pursuant to art. 53 LR | Givaudan Group sales for the first six months of the year were CHF 3,652 million, an increase of 6.2% on a like-for-like1 basis and 8.3% in Swiss francs.

event_name: Givaudan, Bühler, Cargill, ITAL and the FoodTech Hub Latam join forces to strengthen food innovation in Latin America with new Tropical Food Innovation Lab

data.file_name: Givaudan, Bühler, Cargill, ITAL and the FoodTech Hub Latam join forces to strengthen food innovation in Latin America with new Tropical Food Innovation Lab

additional_text: Three leading global companies, Givaudan, Bühler, and Cargill, have formed a consortium in collaboration with the FoodTech HUB Latam and ITAL, Food Technology Institute, to build a food innovation centre in the city of Campinas, recognised as Brazil's tech powerhouse.

event_name: Introducing Spherulite™ HA Ultimate, Givaudan Active Beauty’s sustainable microencapsulated hyaluronic acid (HA) dedicated to lip care

data.file_name: Introducing Spherulite™ HA Ultimate, Givaudan Active Beauty’s sustainable microencapsulated hyaluronic acid (HA) dedicated to lip care

additional_text: Dedicated to lip care, Spherulite™ HA Ultimate demonstrates significant instant and long-term plumping benefits.

event_name: Givaudan’s Olivier Gillotin receives the esteemed Lifetime Achievement Perfumer Award from the American Society of Perfumery (ASP)

data.file_name: Givaudan’s Olivier Gillotin receives the esteemed Lifetime Achievement Perfumer Award from the American Society of Perfumery (ASP)

additional_text: Olivier Gillotin, Vice President of Perfumery, is the recipient of the 2022 ASP Lifetime Achievement Award for his accomplished career and passion for the craft of perfumery.

event_name: Givaudan and Manus Bio launch BioNootkatone, a sustainable, clean-label citrus ingredient with a winning taste profile

data.file_name: Givaudan and Manus Bio launch BioNootkatone, a sustainable, clean-label citrus ingredient with a winning taste profile

additional_text: BioNootkatone is a breakthrough ingredient that answers market demand for sustainable, natural, clean-label citrus flavour without the cost and supply volatility of traditional citrus extracts.

event_name: Bonds issue: Givaudan announces the successful placement of CHF 300M of Swiss Franc Bonds

data.file_name: Bonds issue: Givaudan announces the successful placement of CHF 300M of Swiss Franc Bonds

additional_text: Givaudan SA announces the successful placement of CHF 300M of Swiss Franc Bonds

event_name: Givaudan announces the development of Customer Foresight

data.file_name: Givaudan announces the development of Customer Foresight

additional_text: Givaudan’s ground-breaking Customer Foresight futurescaping platform will leverage big data, artificial intelligence (AI) technology and Givaudan’s deep expertise to co-create food experiences with customers and meet the ever changing needs of consumers.

event_name: Givaudan strengthens Sense Preservation portfolio with NaNino+™, a new natural nitrite alternative for processed meat

data.file_name: Givaudan strengthens Sense Preservation portfolio with NaNino+™, a new natural nitrite alternative for processed meat

additional_text: Givaudan today introduced NaNino+™, a patent-pending synergistic combination of plant-based ingredients and natural flavourings that can be used as a nitrite replacement in processed meat.

event_name: Givaudan Active Beauty introduces Centella CAST, an active cosmetic ingredient that naturally reduces the appearance of stretch marks

data.file_name: Givaudan Active Beauty introduces Centella CAST, an active cosmetic ingredient that naturally reduces the appearance of stretch marks

additional_text: Givaudan Active Beauty introduces Centella CAST, the natural remodelling partner crafted by green fractionation from one of the most well-known medicinal plants, Centella Asiatica.

event_name: Givaudan introduces its SaniScent™ platform, the most comprehensive suite of cross category hygiene technologies to date

data.file_name: Givaudan introduces its SaniScent™ platform, the most comprehensive suite of cross category hygiene technologies to date

additional_text: Givaudan raises the bar on hygiene technologies with the launch of the SaniScent™ platform, the industries' most comprehensive technologies that reinforces hygiene to improve overall health and wellbeing.

event_name: 2022 First quarter sales

data.file_name: 2022 First quarter sales

additional_text: In the first three months of 2022 Givaudan recorded sales of CHF 1,780 million, an increase of 4.6% on a like-for-like basis and 6.4% in Swiss francs.

event_name: Givaudan Active Beauty launches Cristalhyal™ e-Perfection, redefining hyaluronic acid (HA) for flawless skin

data.file_name: Givaudan Active Beauty launches Cristalhyal™ e-Perfection, redefining hyaluronic acid (HA) for flawless skin

additional_text: Cristalhyal™ e-Perfection, the triple-action ingredient, accesses the skin’s deep layers via electrical attraction to provide well-ageing benefits, long-lasting hydration and mattifying effects.

event_name: 2022 Annual General Meeting

data.file_name: 2022 Annual General Meeting

additional_text: The Annual General Meeting of Givaudan SA took place on 24 March 2022. Shareholders provided their voting instructions to the independent voting rights representatives in writing or through a secured online platform.

event_name: Givaudan Active Beauty unveils Patchoul’Up™, a new upcycled active ingredient for hair and scalp

data.file_name: Givaudan Active Beauty unveils Patchoul’Up™, a new upcycled active ingredient for hair and scalp

additional_text: Patchoul’Up™ is a 100% upcycled active ingredient able to rebalance sebum production, eliminate dry flakes and normalise the scalp microbiome for overall wellbeing.

event_name: Givaudan Active Beauty launches Neoporyl™, the next-generation pore therapist

data.file_name: Givaudan Active Beauty launches Neoporyl™, the next-generation pore therapist

additional_text: Givaudan Active Beauty introduces Neoporyl™, an active ingredient that reduces the size of enlarged pores by targeting the biological root causes of parakeratosis, an alteration of the epidermal structure, and dermis fragility.

event_name: Givaudan launches PrimeLock+™ to deliver juicy deliciousness, flavour and stability while reducing fat in plant-based products

data.file_name: Givaudan launches PrimeLock+™ to deliver juicy deliciousness, flavour and stability while reducing fat in plant-based products

additional_text: Givaudan has launched PrimeLock+™, a natural, vegan-friendly integrated solution that mimics animal fat cells, enabling food companies to take plant-based product development and consumer satisfaction to a new level.

event_name: ‘Human by nature’: Givaudan celebrates the beauty of the human experience and connection to nature with a new brand identity

data.file_name: ‘Human by nature’: Givaudan celebrates the beauty of the human experience and connection to nature with a new brand identity

additional_text: Givaudan proudly unveils its new brand identity ‘Human by nature’. The Company is changing the way it presents itself to better reflect the role it plays and the value it brings to its clients and the world at large.

event_name: Givaudan recognised for global supply chain leadership in latest CDP Supplier Engagement Leaderboard

data.file_name: Givaudan recognised for global supply chain leadership in latest CDP Supplier Engagement Leaderboard

additional_text: Givaudan has been recognised once again for its global leadership in supply chain engagement with a place on the prestigious CDP Supplier Engagement Leaderboard.

event_name: 2021 Full year results

data.file_name: 2021 Full year results

additional_text: Ad hoc announcement pursuant to art. 53 LR | Givaudan Group full year sales were CHF 6,684 million, an increase of 7.1% on a like-for-like basis and 5.7% in Swiss francs when compared to 2020.

event_name: Givaudan acquires 48% of Nanovetores Group

data.file_name: Givaudan acquires 48% of Nanovetores Group

additional_text: As part of its 2025 strategy to expand the capabilities of its Active Beauty business, Givaudan today announced that it has acquired a 48% stake in Nanovetores Group from The Criatec Fund, a Brazilian investment fund focused on innovative, early stage companies.

event_name: Givaudan recognised for leading performance in climate and water with third consecutive double A rating from CDP

data.file_name: Givaudan recognised for leading performance in climate and water with third consecutive double A rating from CDP

additional_text: Givaudan has once again been recognised by CDP with a double A rating for its leadership in climate action and water stewardship. The Company is one of a small number that achieved a double A, out of nearly 12,000 businesses that were scored based on data submitted through CDP’s questionnaires in 2021.

event_name: Givaudan introduces PlanetCaps™, the first-to-market biodegradable fragrance capsules

data.file_name: Givaudan introduces PlanetCaps™, the first-to-market biodegradable fragrance capsules

additional_text: For the last six years, Givaudan scientists have been striving to ensure fragrances capsules both deliver outstanding scent release and are kind to nature. The result is PlanetCaps™, a combination of high biodegradability and renewable carbon source material, delivering long-lasting fragrance experience appreciated by both customers and consumers.

event_name: Givaudan completes acquisition of DDW, The Color House

data.file_name: Givaudan completes acquisition of DDW, The Color House

additional_text: Aligned with its 2025 strategy to expand the portfolio of its global Taste & Wellbeing business, Givaudan today announced it has completed the acquisition of DDW, the Color House, a US based natural colour company.

event_name: Givaudan completes the acquisition of Custom Essence

data.file_name: Givaudan completes the acquisition of Custom Essence

additional_text: As part of its 2025 strategy to expand the capabilities of its fragrance business, Givaudan today announced that it has closed the acquisition of Custom Essence, a US based fragrance creation house.

event_name: Bonds issue: Givaudan announces the successful placement of CHF 300M of Swiss Franc Bonds

data.file_name: Bonds issue: Givaudan announces the successful placement of CHF 300M of Swiss Franc Bonds

additional_text: Givaudan today announces the successful dual tranche placement of CHF 300 million of straight Bonds in the domestic market.

event_name: Givaudan opens new Digital Space to drive innovation and continue growing with its customers in China

data.file_name: Givaudan opens new Digital Space to drive innovation and continue growing with its customers in China

additional_text: As part of its long term strategy to expand digital capabilities, Givaudan is pleased to announce the opening of a new Digital Space in China, one of the most digitised markets. It will allow us to leverage transformation opportunities and to support the growth with local and regional customers.

event_name: Givaudan opens Nordic Experience Centre in Sweden

data.file_name: Givaudan opens Nordic Experience Centre in Sweden

additional_text: Givaudan today reaffirmed its commitment to customers and partners in the Nordic region with the opening of the Givaudan Nordic Experience Centre in Malmö, Sweden. The new facility unlocks more opportunities for co-creation with Nordic customers, helping accelerate innovation and enhancing Givaudan’s ability to tailor food and beverages to local trends and preferences.

event_name: Givaudan to acquire Custom Essence

data.file_name: Givaudan to acquire Custom Essence

additional_text: As part of its 2025 strategy to expand the capabilities of its fragrance business, Givaudan today announced that it has reached an agreement to acquire Custom Essence, a US based fragrance creation house.

event_name: Givaudan Active Beauty outpaces the market by leveraging biotech to offer the purest (-)-α-bisabolol

data.file_name: Givaudan Active Beauty outpaces the market by leveraging biotech to offer the purest (-)-α-bisabolol

additional_text: Givaudan Active Beauty is pushing the boundaries of biotechnology by presenting new specifications for BisaboLife®, the purest and sustainable (-)-α-bisabolol. Thanks to an optimised process, we now guarantee an ingredient with a level of purity at a minimum of 99%, the highest rate available in the industry today, outperforming synthetic and natural products.

event_name: Introducing Ma Madeleine™, an olfactory kit guided by a web application to help repair the sense of smell

data.file_name: Introducing Ma Madeleine™, an olfactory kit guided by a web application to help repair the sense of smell

additional_text: Givaudan is proud to be part of a specialised team involved in the making of Ma Madeleine™, a web application that works in tandem with a high-quality olfactory rehabilitation kit.

event_name: Givaudan Active Beauty unveils [N.A.S.]™ Rosemary 01, the organic BHT challenger

data.file_name: Givaudan Active Beauty unveils [N.A.S.]™ Rosemary 01, the organic BHT challenger

additional_text: Givaudan Active Beauty strengthens its portfolio by launching [N.A.S.]™ Rosemary 01, a functional cosmetic ingredient that challenges butylated hydroxytoluene (BHT) by outperforming its efficacy in a natural and organic way.

event_name: Givaudan launches Z-biome™, the first microbiome-centered fragrance technologies

data.file_name: Givaudan launches Z-biome™, the first microbiome-centered fragrance technologies

additional_text: As more and more people believe that wellbeing is connected to the health of the skin, scientists and perfumers have created two innovative technologies, My Z-biome™ and Z-biome™ Deo.

event_name: 2021 Nine month sales

data.file_name: 2021 Nine month sales

additional_text: Ad hoc announcement pursuant to art. 53 LR | In the first nine months of 2021 Givaudan recorded sales of CHF 5,067 million, an increase of 7.7% on a like-for-like basis and 5.8% in Swiss francs.

event_name: Givaudan to acquire DDW, The Color House

data.file_name: Givaudan to acquire DDW, The Color House

additional_text: As part of its 2025 strategy to expand the portfolio of its global Taste & Wellbeing business, Givaudan today announced that it has reached an agreement to acquire DDW, The Color House, a US based natural colour company.

event_name: Givaudan Active Beauty launches Masknyl™ to relieve skin issues associated with mask-wearing

data.file_name: Givaudan Active Beauty launches Masknyl™ to relieve skin issues associated with mask-wearing

additional_text: Givaudan Active Beauty presents Masknyl™, an active ingredient able to counteract redness, inflammation and hyperpigmentation due to mask-wearing.

event_name: Celebrating 75 years of the Givaudan Perfumery School

data.file_name: Celebrating 75 years of the Givaudan Perfumery School

additional_text: Givaudan is delighted to celebrate the 75th anniversary of the Givaudan Perfumery School, a legendary institution recognised for training some of the world’s most renowned perfumers over the years.

event_name: Givaudan joins Animal-Free Safety Assessment Collaboration to advance chemical safety without animal testing globally

data.file_name: Givaudan joins Animal-Free Safety Assessment Collaboration to advance chemical safety without animal testing globally

additional_text: Givaudan is taking its commitment to the next level by joining the Animal-Free Safety Assessment Collaboration. AFSA brings together corporations with non-profits such as Humane Society International (HSI), who share the vision of a non-animal approach to product safety assessment in order to better protect people and our planet.

event_name: Givaudan Active Beauty presents Sericoside to offer skin a second youth through cellular reprogramming

data.file_name: Givaudan Active Beauty presents Sericoside to offer skin a second youth through cellular reprogramming

additional_text: Givaudan Active Beauty unveils Sericoside, an active ingredient with the well-ageing power to offer skin a second youth by resetting its cellular memory.

event_name: Givaudan, Bühler, and Migros establish pilot plant for cultured meat

data.file_name: Givaudan, Bühler, and Migros establish pilot plant for cultured meat

additional_text: Three companies Givaudan, Bühler and Migros have formed a new entity, The Cultured Food Innovation Hub, in Kemptthal near Zurich, to accelerate the development and market penetration of cellular agriculture products.

event_name: Givaudan launches new Protein Hub at its Zurich Innovation Centre

data.file_name: Givaudan launches new Protein Hub at its Zurich Innovation Centre

additional_text: Givaudan today expanded its global protein innovation network with a new Protein Hub at its flagship Zurich Innovation Centre in Kemptthal, Switzerland.

event_name: Givaudan further expands fragrance production capabilities in Pedro Escobedo, Mexico

data.file_name: Givaudan further expands fragrance production capabilities in Pedro Escobedo, Mexico

additional_text: Givaudan Fragrance & Beauty today announced a CHF 75 million investment in a new extension to its Pedro Escobedo (Mexico) production facility to further support its growth in Latin America across customer segments.

event_name: Givaudan signs joint venture with India’s Privi Speciality Chemicals Limited

data.file_name: Givaudan signs joint venture with India’s Privi Speciality Chemicals Limited

additional_text: Givaudan has signed a joint venture agreement with Privi Speciality Chemicals Limited, India, to strengthen production capabilities for its global speciality fragrance ingredients.

event_name: Givaudan invests in series A fundraising for Next Beauty China

data.file_name: Givaudan invests in series A fundraising for Next Beauty China

additional_text: Givaudan announces that it has invested in the series A funding round of Next Beauty, a leading incubator for emerging fragrance & beauty brands looking to grow in China.

event_name: Givaudan draws inspiration from nature with Phytogaia™ and Thalassogaia™

data.file_name: Givaudan draws inspiration from nature with Phytogaia™ and Thalassogaia™

additional_text: Givaudan is delighted to unveil two new innovative fragrance technologies, Phytogaia™ and Thalassogaia™, which are inspired by nature allowing perfumers to bring the natural benefits of forests and the ocean into perfumes.

event_name: 2021 Half year results

data.file_name: 2021 Half year results

additional_text: Givaudan Group sales for the first six months of the year were CHF 3,373 million, an increase of 7.9% on a like-for-like basis and 4.7% in Swiss francs.

event_name: Givaudan strengthens e-commerce presence in China with 1688.com partnership

data.file_name: Givaudan strengthens e-commerce presence in China with 1688.com partnership

additional_text: Givaudan, the global leader in fragrance and beauty has strengthened its e-commerce offering in China through the opening of its flagship business-to-business (B2B) store on China’s leading wholesale website, 1688.com.

event_name: Givaudan acquires 25% of b.kolormakeup & skincare’s shares

data.file_name: Givaudan acquires 25% of b.kolormakeup & skincare’s shares

additional_text: Givaudan announces that it has acquired 25% of b.kolormakeup & skincare’s shares, an innovative Italian company specialised in developing and producing end to end products in make-up and skin care for Consumer Packaged Goods (CPG) and luxury customers.

event_name: World’s first toxicology testing strategy without animal testing adopted by OECD

data.file_name: World’s first toxicology testing strategy without animal testing adopted by OECD

additional_text: The world’s first toxicology testing strategy without animal testing has been approved by the OECD (Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development). It can be used to predict whether a substance causes allergic reactions in the skin.

event_name: Givaudan’s Calice Becker receives prestigious Lifetime Achievement Perfumer Award from The Fragrance Foundation (TFF)

data.file_name: Givaudan’s Calice Becker receives prestigious Lifetime Achievement Perfumer Award from The Fragrance Foundation (TFF)

additional_text: Givaudan is delighted to announce that Calice Becker, Vice President Perfumer and Director of the Givaudan Perfumery School, is the recipient of the 2021 Fragrance Foundation's Lifetime Achievement Perfumer Award for her celebrated career and visionary leadership in advancing the art of perfumery.

event_name: Givaudan leads fine fragrance digital innovation through first-of-its-kind partnership with Tmall in China

data.file_name: Givaudan leads fine fragrance digital innovation through first-of-its-kind partnership with Tmall in China

additional_text: Givaudan, the global leader in fragrance creation, has entered into an industry-first partnership with Tmall, the Alibaba group's open business-to-consumer (B2C) platform, to launch the T-Lab source innovation laboratory and capture digital opportunities for fragrance creation in China.

event_name: Givaudan COVID-19 Communities Fund to support severely impacted countries

data.file_name: Givaudan COVID-19 Communities Fund to support severely impacted countries

additional_text: Givaudan announced today that it will provide additional targeted support to countries most severely affected by the ongoing coronavirus pandemic in 2021 through its COVID-19 Communities Fund.

event_name: Givaudan joins Together for Sustainability (TfS)

data.file_name: Givaudan joins Together for Sustainability (TfS)

additional_text: Givaudan has joined Together for Sustainability (TfS); a global sector supply chain initiative. Givaudan joins the organisation’s 30 existing members who include BASF, Henkel, and Sanofi.

event_name: Givaudan launches ‘Touch Again’, an experiential fine fragrance showcase in Shanghai

data.file_name: Givaudan launches ‘Touch Again’, an experiential fine fragrance showcase in Shanghai

additional_text: Givaudan launches ‘Touch Again’ to highlight the transformative power of scent in uplifting the human spirit through four themes, addressing the uncertainty, loneliness and lack of human touch that has resulted from the pandemic.

event_name: Enhancing the fragrance experience with Givaudan’s innovative Bloomful™ platform

data.file_name: Enhancing the fragrance experience with Givaudan’s innovative Bloomful™ platform

additional_text: By combining our perfumers’ understanding of bloom with an array of scientific analysis, Bloomful™ makes it easier to define and measure this fascinating concept, which can add an appealing new olfactive dimension to many consumer products.

event_name: ​The Journal of Nutrition publishes clinical results confirming TurmiPure Gold® delivers superior curcuminoids bioavailability at a low dose

data.file_name: ​The Journal of Nutrition publishes clinical results confirming TurmiPure Gold® delivers superior curcuminoids bioavailability at a low dose

additional_text: Newly published randomised crossover study in healthy adults compares the efficacy of five turmeric formulas at their recommended daily dose, with TurmiPure Gold® demonstrating bioequivalence at a low dose for the first time.

event_name: Givaudan and Bühler open Protein Innovation Centre in Singapore

data.file_name: Givaudan and Bühler open Protein Innovation Centre in Singapore

additional_text: Givaudan, a global leading company in taste and wellbeing, and Bühler, global leader for food processing solutions, today jointly announced the official opening of the APAC Protein Innovation Centre.

event_name: Givaudan introduces Sourcing4Good programme

data.file_name: Givaudan introduces Sourcing4Good programme

additional_text: To mark Earth Day 2021, Givaudan has today unveiled its Sourcing4Good programme, opening a new chapter in its responsible sourcing approach.

event_name: Givaudan completes the acquisition of Myrissi

data.file_name: Givaudan completes the acquisition of Myrissi

additional_text: As part of its long term strategy to expand its capabilities in artificial intelligence (AI), Givaudan today announced that it has closed the acquisition of Myrissi.

event_name: 2021 First quarter sales

data.file_name: 2021 First quarter sales

additional_text: In the first three months of 2021 Givaudan recorded sales of CHF 1,674 million, an increase of 7.7% on a like-for-like basis and 3.4% in Swiss francs.

event_name: Givaudan introduces perfumery’s first ‘blossom[lab]™’ to design the future of Naturals at Origin

data.file_name: Givaudan introduces perfumery’s first ‘blossom[lab]™’ to design the future of Naturals at Origin

additional_text: Givaudan is breaking new ground in nature-conscious fragrance creation with the introduction of its blossom[lab]™. It is designed from repurposed shipping containers in Grasse, France and will be able to travel by truck or boat for immersive research at the heart of nature's most precious sites around the world.

event_name: Givaudan Active Beauty tackles oily skin issues and outperforms retinoic acid with Mangixyl™

data.file_name: Givaudan Active Beauty tackles oily skin issues and outperforms retinoic acid with Mangixyl™

additional_text: Givaudan Active Beauty is proud to launch Mangixyl™, a powerful microbiome-friendly cosmetic ingredient with proven efficacy targeting oily skin through sebum regulation.

event_name: Givaudan joins WBCSD and 40 member companies to launch Vision 2050: Time to Transform

data.file_name: Givaudan joins WBCSD and 40 member companies to launch Vision 2050: Time to Transform

additional_text: Givaudan has joined the World Business Council for Sustainable Development (WBCSD) and more than 40 of its members including Unilever, Nestlé and Natura, to launch “Vision 2050: Time to Transform”.

event_name: 2021 Annual General Meeting

data.file_name: 2021 Annual General Meeting

additional_text: The Annual General Meeting of Givaudan SA took place on 25 March 2021. Shareholders provided their voting instructions to the independent voting rights representatives in writing or through a secured online platform.

event_name: Givaudan launches the Aroma Kiosk

data.file_name: Givaudan launches the Aroma Kiosk

additional_text: Givaudan Taste & Wellbeing has announced the launch of the Aroma Kiosk, a ground-breaking new digital sensory insights tool, which is designed to connect with consumers in dynamic environments such as grocery and department stores, universities and shopping malls to gather valuable consumer insights and recommend products in real time.

event_name: Givaudan Active Beauty unveils Chronoglow™

data.file_name: Givaudan Active Beauty unveils Chronoglow™

additional_text: Givaudan Active Beauty presents Chronoglow™, an active ingredient crafted by green fractionation and empowered by artificial intelligence (AI) able to mimic botanical epigenetic mechanisms for skin care benefits.

event_name: Givaudan launches its Naturality Index™ to support nature conscious fragrance creation

data.file_name: Givaudan launches its Naturality Index™ to support nature conscious fragrance creation

additional_text: Givaudan is accelerating its journey towards nature-conscious creations with the launch of its Naturality Index™ and in line with the Company’s purpose goal to “show our love for nature in everything we do”.

event_name: Givaudan reorganises its Taste & Wellbeing product portfolio around Food Experience spaces

data.file_name: Givaudan reorganises its Taste & Wellbeing product portfolio around Food Experience spaces

additional_text: Givaudan Taste & Wellbeing has announced it has strategically realigned its portfolio to better reflect how, through its expanded product offering and capabilities, it supports customers to deliver future facing food experiences that consumers value.

event_name: Givaudan launches groundbreaking consumer segmentation tool in North America focused on flavor

data.file_name: Givaudan launches groundbreaking consumer segmentation tool in North America focused on flavor

additional_text: Givaudan Taste & Wellbeing has partnered with leading market intelligence firm Bellomy to launch FlavorFinders™, a unique research-backed, patent pending segmentation tool that will evolve the way flavor strategy is built, for the North America market.

event_name: Givaudan Active Beauty presents Omegablue®, an upcycled ingredient dedicated to skin repair

data.file_name: Givaudan Active Beauty presents Omegablue®, an upcycled ingredient dedicated to skin repair

additional_text: Givaudan Active Beauty launches Omegablue®, a cosmetic ingredient created from upcycled wild bilberries used for advanced skin repair. A plant that grows in Central and Northern Europe, we’ve upcycled the seeds to craft a natural ingredient to revert skin dryness, irritation, and desquamation caused by lipid barrier damage.

event_name: Givaudan launches ground-breaking AI tools for next generation product development

data.file_name: Givaudan launches ground-breaking AI tools for next generation product development

additional_text: Givaudan Taste & Wellbeing has announced the launch of its unique Advanced Tools for Modelling (ATOM) which use state-of-the-art artificial intelligence to optimise food and flavour formulation and facilitate co-creation and collaboration with customers.

event_name: Givaudan included in CDP Supplier Engagement Leaderboard

data.file_name: Givaudan included in CDP Supplier Engagement Leaderboard

additional_text: Givaudan has been included once again in CDP’s prestigious Supplier Engagement Leaderboard. Its inclusion places it in the top 7% of companies out of more than 9,600 who disclose their environmental data through CDP annually.

event_name: Givaudan Active Beauty unveils Nootropics

data.file_name: Givaudan Active Beauty unveils Nootropics

additional_text: Givaudan Active Beauty presents Nootropics, a collection of six natural and traceable extracts featuring guarana, ginger, green tea, gotu kola, ginkgo and green coffee, well-known among the industry and consumers for their impressive functions as food supplements and their cosmetic properties.

event_name: Givaudan to acquire Myrissi

data.file_name: Givaudan to acquire Myrissi

additional_text: As part of its long term strategy to expand its capabilities in Artificial Intelligence (AI), Givaudan today announced that it is to acquire Myrissi.

event_name: 2020 Full year results

data.file_name: 2020 Full year results

additional_text: Givaudan Group full year sales were CHF 6,322 million, an increase of 4.0% on a like-for-like basis and 1.9% in Swiss francs when compared to 2019.

event_name: Givaudan recognised for second year running in prestigious CDP A List for leading the way on global climate action and water stewardship

data.file_name: Givaudan recognised for second year running in prestigious CDP A List for leading the way on global climate action and water stewardship

additional_text: Givaudan’s leading work on climate action and water stewardship has once again been recognised with a CDP double A rating. CDP’s annual environmental disclosure and scoring process is widely recognised as the gold standard of corporate environmental transparency.

event_name: Givaudan launches new micro-financing project to support patchouli farmers and distillers in Sulawesi

data.file_name: Givaudan launches new micro-financing project to support patchouli farmers and distillers in Sulawesi

additional_text: Givaudan has launched a new project making available a total of USD 360,000 in micro-financed loans for farmers and distillers in Indonesia. The loans will enable farmers and distillers to improve the sustainability of their farming practices and to improve yields.

event_name: Givaudan ranked in top 1% of performers in FTSE4Good Index Series

data.file_name: Givaudan ranked in top 1% of performers in FTSE4Good Index Series

additional_text: Givaudan has been included for the fifth consecutive year, in the globally-recognised FTSE4Good Index Series following an independent review earlier in 2020.

event_name: Givaudan and Novozymes announce a research partnership

data.file_name: Givaudan and Novozymes announce a research partnership

additional_text: Givaudan and Novozymes, the world leaders in their respective industries, are excited to announce the formation of a strategic research partnership for the development of synergistic innovative ingredients and technologies for customers.

event_name: Givaudan awarded platinum medal in EcoVadis Corporate Social Responsibility assessment

data.file_name: Givaudan awarded platinum medal in EcoVadis Corporate Social Responsibility assessment

additional_text: Givaudan has been ranked in the top 1% of the EcoVadis Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) assessment 2020, achieving its highest accolade; the platinum medal.

event_name: Givaudan signs WBCSD CEO Guide to Human Rights

data.file_name: Givaudan signs WBCSD CEO Guide to Human Rights

additional_text: The guide sets out the actions that businesses must take to lead the way in this vital space and acts as call-to-action to encourage others to join these efforts.

event_name: Givaudan prepares for the future of perfumery with ‘Naturals at Origin’

data.file_name: Givaudan prepares for the future of perfumery with ‘Naturals at Origin’

additional_text: Givaudan is delighted to unveil ‘Naturals at Origin’, a strategic approach for the sourcing, development and innovation of responsible naturals directly in the country of origin.

event_name: Givaudan opens its world-class fragrance production facility in Changzhou, China

data.file_name: Givaudan opens its world-class fragrance production facility in Changzhou, China

additional_text: Givaudan today opened its newest state-of-the-art fragrance production facility in Changzhou, China. In line with the recently announced 2025 strategy - Committed to Growth, with Purpose - China remains a key growth market for innovative and consumer-preferred fragranced products.

event_name: Bonds issue: Givaudan announces the issue of Swiss franc domestic bonds

data.file_name: Bonds issue: Givaudan announces the issue of Swiss franc domestic bonds

additional_text: Givaudan SA announces today the issue of Swiss franc straight bonds of CHF 150,000,000 in the Swiss franc domestic market.

event_name: 2020 Nine month sales

data.file_name: 2020 Nine month sales

additional_text: In the first nine months of 2020 Givaudan recorded sales of CHF 4,790 million, an increase of 3.7% on a like-for-like basis and 2.7% in Swiss francs.

event_name: Givaudan divests pectin business to Herbstreith & Fox

data.file_name: Givaudan divests pectin business to Herbstreith & Fox

additional_text: Givaudan today announced that it has divested its pectin business, part of the Naturex portfolio, to Herbstreith & Fox, a leading family-owned producer of pectin based in Neuenbürg, Germany.

event_name: Givaudan further reinforces nature and climate commitments signing Business for Nature call-to-action

data.file_name: Givaudan further reinforces nature and climate commitments signing Business for Nature call-to-action

additional_text: Givaudan has further reinforced its ambitious commitments to nature and climate action by signing up to Business for Nature’s ‘Nature is everyone’s business’ call-to-action.

event_name: Givaudan introduces its Naturality Platform™, a major step towards nature-conscious fragrances creation

data.file_name: Givaudan introduces its Naturality Platform™, a major step towards nature-conscious fragrances creation

additional_text: Givaudan introduces its Naturality Platform™, reinforcing its capabilities and commitment to nature-conscious fragrances, and advancing the Company purpose of “Creating for happier, healthier lives with love for nature”.

event_name: Givaudan becomes founding member of B Lab’s B Movement Builders

data.file_name: Givaudan becomes founding member of B Lab’s B Movement Builders

additional_text: Givaudan has today announced its role as a founding member of the B Movement Builders initiative, aligned with its ambition to become a Certified B Corp.

event_name: Givaudan renames its Flavour and Fragrance divisions to Taste & Wellbeing and Fragrance & Beauty

data.file_name: Givaudan renames its Flavour and Fragrance divisions to Taste & Wellbeing and Fragrance & Beauty

additional_text: Givaudan, the world’s leading flavours and fragrances company, has announced it is evolving the name of its Flavour and Fragrance divisions to reflect its expanded product offering to its customers.

event_name: Givaudan announces its 2025 strategy

data.file_name: Givaudan announces its 2025 strategy

additional_text: Givaudan today announced its roadmap and ambitious financial targets for the next five years, Committed to Growth, with Purpose.

event_name: Givaudan completes the acquisition of Alderys

data.file_name: Givaudan completes the acquisition of Alderys

additional_text: As part of its long term strategy to expand its capabilities in bio-engineering technologies, Givaudan today announced that it has closed the acquisition of Alderys.

event_name: 2020 Half year results

data.file_name: 2020 Half year results

additional_text: Givaudan Group sales for the first six months of the year were CHF 3,221 million, an increase of 4.0% on a like-for-like basis and 4.1% in Swiss francs.

event_name: Givaudan sets an ambition to become a certified B Corp

data.file_name: Givaudan sets an ambition to become a certified B Corp

additional_text: Givaudan today announces its intention to become a certified B Corporation (B Corp). Givaudan is the first in its industry and one of the largest businesses to commit to this journey.

event_name: Givaudan launches Koffee’Up™, a new sustainable beauty elixir crafted from upcycled Arabica coffee

data.file_name: Givaudan launches Koffee’Up™, a new sustainable beauty elixir crafted from upcycled Arabica coffee

additional_text: Givaudan Active Beauty is proud to launch Koffee’Up™, a scientifically proven premium coffee oil crafted using upcycling techniques.

event_name: Givaudan launches VivaScentz™, a leading edge fragrance innovation to enhance consumer wellbeing

data.file_name: Givaudan launches VivaScentz™, a leading edge fragrance innovation to enhance consumer wellbeing

additional_text: Givaudan is proud to launch VivaScentz™, an exclusive and radically new technology guiding our creative teams in crafting fragrances with wellbeing benefits across all categories of perfume including fine fragrance, personal, home, and fabric care as well as oral care flavours.

event_name: Givaudan completes the acquisition of the cosmetics business of Indena

data.file_name: Givaudan completes the acquisition of the cosmetics business of Indena

additional_text: As part of its long term strategy to expand the capabilities of its Active Beauty business, Givaudan today announced that it has completed the acquisition of the cosmetics business of Indena.

event_name: Givaudan to acquire Alderys

data.file_name: Givaudan to acquire Alderys

additional_text: As part of its long term strategy to expand its capabilities in bio-engineering technologies, Givaudan today announced that it is to acquire Alderys.

event_name: Givaudan announces divestiture of processed and grated cheese business

data.file_name: Givaudan announces divestiture of processed and grated cheese business

additional_text: Givaudan today announced that it has entered into an agreement to divest its processed and grated cheese business to St. Paul Group, a cheese specialist with premises in Belgium and the Netherlands.

event_name: Givaudan announces the successful placement of EUR 1,000 million of senior debt

data.file_name: Givaudan announces the successful placement of EUR 1,000 million of senior debt

additional_text: Givaudan today announces the successful dual tranche placement of EUR 1,000 million of senior debt notes.

event_name: 2020 First quarter sales

data.file_name: 2020 First quarter sales

additional_text: In the first three months of 2020 Givaudan recorded sales of CHF 1,619 million, an increase of 5.4% on a like-for-like basis and 6.1% in Swiss francs.

event_name: Givaudan joins global efforts to provide hand sanitiser for medical, community and front line service needs

data.file_name: Givaudan joins global efforts to provide hand sanitiser for medical, community and front line service needs

additional_text: A new, dedicated production line established in its Vernier (Geneva) site will donate the equivalent of almost 700,000 bottles.

event_name: Givaudan establishes COVID-19 Communities Fund

data.file_name: Givaudan establishes COVID-19 Communities Fund

additional_text: Givaudan is today establishing the Givaudan COVID-19 Communities Fund to enable Givaudan sites to support local communities that have been affected by the global COVID-19 pandemic.

event_name: A message from our CEO

data.file_name: A message from our CEO

additional_text: With coronavirus we are facing an unprecedented situation that is impacting all of us personally and professionally.

event_name: 2020 Annual General Meeting

data.file_name: 2020 Annual General Meeting

additional_text: The Annual General Meeting of Givaudan SA took place on 25 March 2020. In view of the situation regarding the spread of the coronavirus (COVID-19) the meeting was limited to the statutory meeting with reduced attendance by its representatives, and shareholders provided their voting instructions to the independent voting rights representatives in writing or through a secured online platform.

event_name: Givaudan endorses UN CEO Water Mandate

data.file_name: Givaudan endorses UN CEO Water Mandate

additional_text: Givaudan has endorsed the CEO Water Mandate, a UN Global Compact initiative which brings together a critical mass of business leaders to address global water challenges.

event_name: Coronavirus

data.file_name: Coronavirus

additional_text: As we face the global challenge of coronavirus (COVID-19), at Givaudan, we want to share our support and solidarity with our customers, our employees, our partners and suppliers, and our communities.

event_name: Givaudan Active Beauty launches Synchronight™

data.file_name: Givaudan Active Beauty launches Synchronight™

additional_text: Givaudan Active Beauty is thrilled to launch its new breakthrough innovation called Synchronight™, an active cosmetic ingredient made from gardenia fruit extract designed to protect the skin from digital stress.

event_name: Givaudan completes acquisition of Ungerer

data.file_name: Givaudan completes acquisition of Ungerer

additional_text: Givaudan, the global leader in fragrances and flavours, today announced it has completed the acquisition of Ungerer & Company, the US based Flavour, Fragrance and Specialty Ingredients company.

event_name: Givaudan scored double ‘A’ by CDP for both climate change and water security

data.file_name: Givaudan scored double ‘A’ by CDP for both climate change and water security

additional_text: Givaudan is recognised for its leadership in water security by CDP with the highest ‘A’ score.
